This update brings Story Maker for your remarkable Instagram postings.

Hurry up to experiment with ready-to-use templates and share your cool stories with the world! And if you’re feeling generous, please leave your review on the App

Great news! This update brings Icon Maker to let you customize apps’ icons in a few secs.
